author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...GIL NOW A POST-TROPICAL CYCLONE... ...THIS IS THE LAST NHC ADVISORY...
summary: ...GIL NOW A POST-TROPICAL CYCLONE... ...THIS IS THE LAST NHC ADVISORY... As of 5:00 AM HST Sun Aug 03 the center of Gil was located near 20.6, -135.7 with movement WNW at 18 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...GIL NOW A POST-TROPICAL CYCLONE... ...THIS IS THE LAST NHC ADVISORY... As of 5:00 AM HST Sun Aug 03 the center of Gil was located near 20.6, -135.7 with movement WNW at 18 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Post-Tropical Cyclone Gil (EP2/EP072025)
